bill.title: Relating To The Hawaii Civil Rights Commission.
bill.description: Authorizes the Hawaii Civil Rights Commission Executive Director, except for fair housing cases, to either issue a final conciliation demand that the respondent cease the unlawful discriminatory practice or dismiss a discrimination complaint and issue a notice of right to sue. (SB2805 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to LBR/JDC, WAM.
The committee(s) on LBR/JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 02-01-18 2:50PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, K. Rhoads, Kim, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard.

The committee(s) on LBR recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in LBR were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, S. Chang, Ihara, Taniguchi; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) English.
Reported from LBR/JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2201) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-22-18 10:10AM in conference room 211.
The committee on WAM has deleted the measure from decision making scheduled on 02-22-18 10:10AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-23-18 10:30AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, English, Galuteria, Harimoto, Inouye, K. Kahele, Kidani, Riviere, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2879) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 03-06-18.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 319).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, JUD, referral sheet 36
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Thursday, 03-15-18 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Holt, Evans, Ichiyama, Keohokalole, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1291-18) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Fukumoto, Johanson, C. Lee, Souki, Todd excused (5).
